name: EWNetwork: Red and Blue - Episode 1
detailed_description:
EWNetwork Red & Blue is an episodic adventure visual novel revolving around the life of a girl in New York City, coming out of college. She sets out in search of love. Which, gets her in interesting places, such as a party with YouTube entertainer Desmond "Etika" Amofah. A story of love, hate, and comedic galore awaits you in the universe of Red and Blue!

Including:

  • Peaceful soundtrack.
  • Beautiful 3D renders.
  • Engaging and gripping story.
  • Multiple endings based on the choices you make.

EPISODE LIST:

  • Episode 1 - New Beginnings (Available May 24)
  • Episode 2 - (Name TBD)
  • Episode 3 - (Name TBD)
  • Episode 4 - (Name TBD)
  • Episode 5 - (Name TBD)

All episodes are free to download.

short_description: Welcome to the world of EWNetwork: Red and Blue, with an all new original story told through the eyes of a college girl who just graduated.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is a bit demanding on the CPU. We will continue to optimize it so that this doesn't happen as much.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is a bit demanding on the CPU. We will continue to optimize it so that this doesn't happen as much.
